get.description: List all listings

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Order status to filter by

parameters.name: sell_item_contract_address
parameters.description: Sell item contract address to filter by

parameters.name: buy_item_type
parameters.description: Buy item type to filter by

parameters.name: buy_item_contract_address
parameters.description: Buy item contract address to filter by

parameters.name: account_address
parameters.description: The account address of the user who created the listing

parameters.name: sell_item_metadata_id
parameters.description: The metadata_id of the sell item

parameters.name: sell_item_token_id
parameters.description: Sell item token identifier to filter by

parameters.name: from_updated_at
parameters.description: From updated at including given date

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return per page

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Order field to sort by. `buy_item_amount` sorts by per token price, for example if 5 ERC-1155s are on sale for 10eth, it’s sorted as 2eth for `buy_item_amount`.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Ascending or descending direction for sort

schema.description: Ascending or descending direction for sort

parameters.name: page_cursor
parameters.description: Page cursor to retrieve previous or next page. Use the value returned in the response.

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found (404)

MetadataRefreshLimit.description: The refresh request limit available to the project for each one-hour window.

MetadataRefreshLimitReset.description: The expiry date of the current one-hour window.

MetadataRefreshLimitRemaining.description: The number of refresh requests remaining in the current window.

MetadataRefreshRetryAfter.description: The number of seconds until the next refresh request can be made.

MintRequestsLimit.description: The mint requests limit available to the project for each time window.

MintRequestsLimitReset.description: The expiry date of the current time window.

MintRequestsLimitRemaining.description: The number of mint requests remaining in the current window.

MintRequestsRetryAfter.description: The number of seconds until the next refresh request can be made.

The order status that indicates an order cannot be fulfilled.
